locations.name: Madrid
locations.description: Spain's elegant capital city, the starting point of the tour, known for its art museums, Royal Palace, and vibrant plazas.

locations.name: Seville
locations.description: The capital of Andalusia, described as its 'fiery heart', famous for the Alcázar, Santa Cruz quarter, and flamenco.

locations.name: Granada
locations.description: City at the foot of the Sierra Nevada, renowned for the magnificent Alhambra Palace and Generalife Gardens.

locations.name: Montecorto
locations.description: A picturesque 'white village' in the Andalusian hills, offering a tranquil retreat for relaxation and experiencing rural Spain.
